title: GCP Project Structure Best Practices
content:
# Understanding GCP Projects

## What is a Project?
- Fundamental container for all GCP resources
- Complete isolation between projects
- Independent billing and IAM

## Best Practices
- Separate projects for prod, dev, staging
- Use a sandbox project for experiments
- Never mix environments in one project

## Example Structure

your-startup/
├── app-prod
├── app-dev
├── app-staging
└── sandbox

title: Getting Started with Compute Engine VMs
content:
# Compute Engine for Startups

## How Many VMs Do You Need?
- Not limited by count, but by credits/quotas
- Focus on smart architecture over quantity

## Sizing Recommendations
- Start small (e2-micro for testing)
- Scale up based on actual needs
- Monitor resource usage

## Multiple Apps Strategy
- One app per VM vs. multiple apps
- Container approach (Docker)

title: SSH and Port Forwarding with GCP VMs
content:
Content:

Basic SSH connection: gcloud compute ssh
Port forwarding for development
Accessing localhost services remotely


# Basic SSH
gcloud compute ssh sandbox --zone=us-central1-a

# SSH with port forwarding
gcloud compute ssh sandbox --zone=us-central1-a -- -L 8080:localhost:3000

# Exit SSH session
exit
